views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9, 10, 11 and 12

SmartCameraShutter gives you visual options to make better and more functional your Camera Application adding these nice Features:

- Disable the Swipe to Swipe modes in the Shutter Buttons.

- Disable Sound in the Shutter Photo Button.

- Enable the Camera Shutter Buttons always on Adaptive Background (in the inner Circles).

- Enable the Camera Shutter Buttons Smaller (this option combined with the Adaptive Background will hide the Shutter Buttons).

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Credits are on Preferences Panel.
